ValidationRule.description: While creating a new SR, only Sys Admin and Honeywell Sys Admin can set the complexity level to 5
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Complexity_Level__c , '5-IPDS Phase 6 Issues - CSB'), ISNEW() , ($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <> "Honeywell System Administrator" )),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not authorized to set Complexity Level to '5-IPDS Phase 6 Issues - CSB'
